float eval () const

 function type (sin, triangle, square, saw-tooth or inverse saw-tooth).

 function arguments (offset, amplitude, phase offset and rate).

Detailed Description

Shader function class.

This class implements a shader typical function, whose type can be:

Sin Triangle Square Saw-tooth Inverse saw-tooth
